title.narrative: Amélioration des capacités dadaptation et de résilience

description.narrative: Renforcer les capacités des institutions et améliorer les capacités dadaptation et de résilience des communautés rurales face aux risques supplémentaires que le changement climatique et la variabilité du climat apportent sur leurs moyens de subsistance

Activity Web Page

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.A.1

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Policy, legal, regulatory and institutional frameworks

title.narrative: Output Indicator 2.3.1.1.1

description.narrative: Country has data-informed development and investment plans that incorporate integrated solutions to reduce disaster risks and enable climate change adaptation and mitigation

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.4.1.2.D

description.narrative: Natural resources that are managed under a sustainable use, conservation, access and benefit-sharing regime: Area under sustainable forest management (hectares)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.C.2

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households with access

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.A.2

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Total households with access

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.2.3.C.2

description.narrative: Country has an improved enabling environment for expansion of decent work and livelihoods: Direct support of livelihood in: Private sector (If YES, please provide Number of livelihoods supported)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.5.1.1.C.1

description.narrative: Number and proportion of households benefitting from clean, affordable and sustainable energy access: Rural households
